name: LifeVantage Corporation
description: LifeVantage Corporation is a premier biotechnology company dedicated to the development and marketing of innovative products that promote a healthier lifestyle and enhance well-being. Founded in 2003 and headquartered in Sandy, Utah, LifeVantage is best known for its flagship product, Protandim, an advanced dietary supplement designed to reduce oxidative stress and promote cellular health. The company leverages its proprietary science and research to create a range of products that target aging, wellness, and overall health. LifeVantage operates using a direct selling model, empowering individuals to build their own businesses by promoting and selling its products. The company emphasizes the importance of education and support for its distributors, providing them with the tools needed to succeed in the competitive health and wellness market. LifeVantage is committed to scientific research and has conducted multiple studies to substantiate the efficacy of its products. The company's mission is to empower people to live longer, healthier lives by harnessing the power of science and the body’s own natural processes. As a leader in the wellness industry, LifeVantage continues to expand its product offerings and market presence, aiming to transform lives and communities around the world.
